item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, October 21, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Musk under fire over $1mn prize offer for voters who sign petition
2. Trump’s vulgar rally ramble fuels questions over his state of mind
3. Moldovans back EU accession talks by razor-thin majority
4. Top UK law firms raise hourly rates by 40% in five years
5. PwC offers ‘managing director’ title to retain staff who will not be partner
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, October 21, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
